fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: The present participation to the transparency register is due to my mandate as Sector Chair of the Enterprise Europe Network. We steer and coordinate the actions of our Sector Group, an Enterprise Europe Network internal group aiming at helping SMEs to develop internationally in a structured way.
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Consultative and supportive Group for the Enterprise Europe Network#E02814#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2814#Member#B#Other#Sector group experts
goals__remit:
I am a member of the Enterprise Europe Network, the Commission’s official business support Network and the world’s largest of this kind. 
http://een.ec.europa.eu/
relevant_communication: I am dealing mainly with ICT & Space.
customers: Executive Agency for Small and Medium Enterprises
